Hey folks, I've been searching for an answer to this problem, but I
cannot =
seem to find one.  Perhaps I'm just special?  :)  Specifically,
I've define=
d a base class with setup and teardown methods that are
supposed to be call=
ed before and after all tests are run.  To do this,
I'm using the @BeforeCl=
ass and @AfterClass annotations.  I then extend
this base class, which can =
have a local setup/teardown, and the tests in
them.  When I run it, I get a=
n exception stating that the base class's
setup method should be static.

N=
ote:  I'm using Eclipse and the JUnit 3.8.x runner.  My test classes
have t=
he static suite method that utilize the JUnit4TestAdapter.

Mike
